alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Newport News; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 8:22AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Isle of Wight, and southeastern York Counties, the City of Poquoson, the northeastern City of Suffolk, the City of Hampton and the City of Newport News through 845 AM EST... At 821 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tabb to near Isle Of Wight. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hampton, Langley AFB, Seaford, Patrick Henry Field, Tabb and Beaconsdale around 825 AM EST. Rescue around 830 AM EST. Christopher Newport University and Suffolk around 835 AM EST. Northampton around 840 AM EST. Hampton University, Buckroe Beach, Fort Monroe and Grand View around 845 AM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Fox Hill, Carrollton, Phoebus, Langley View, Longview, Benns Church, Oriana, Wills Corner, Bethel Church and Hilton Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for southeastern Virginia.
